Term.Name: modalities
Term.Definition: Decomposition of into segments representing the visual and audio modalities of the segment, or single streams of these modalities

Term.Name: key elements
Term.Definition: Temporal decomposition of a audiovisual segment into key elements representing it

Term.Name: genericmsd
Term.Definition: Generic decomposition of a audiovisual segment into segments representing modalities and/or key elements.

Term.Name: shots
Term.Definition: Temporal decomposition of an audiovisual segment into shots (and gradual transitions)

Term.Name: objects
Term.Definition: Spatioemporal decomposition of a visual segment into objects in the scene

Term.Name: faces
Term.Definition: Spatioemporal decomposition of a visual segment into regions representing faces

Term.Name: persons
Term.Definition: Spatioemporal decomposition of a visual segment into regions representing persons

Term.Name: audio segments
Term.Definition: Temporal decomposition of an audio segment into audio segments

Term.Name: speech
Term.Definition: Temporal decomposition of an audio segment into speech segments

Term.Name: sentences
Term.Definition: Temporal decomposition of an audio segment into spoken sentences

Term.Name: words
Term.Definition: Temporal decomposition of an audio segment into spoken words

Term.Name: scenes
Term.Definition: Temporal decomposition of an audiovisual segment into scenes and/or stories

Term.Name: copies
Term.Definition: Temporal decomposition of an audiovisual segment into segments representing copies or repeated clips
